::Razorclaw::
Razorclaw rushes Khonkolor, crossing ground quickly. He leaps 
forward stabbing with his sonic sword at the downed Khonkolor. 



On 4 Apr 2001, at 1:55, airly2000@... wrote:

> Khonkolor::
> 
> Khonkolor hears something strange that made him turned his head and see RazorClaw shot him he moved but one of shot hit him and fell in ground... He shook his head trying to find out what had happened ... 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rAuq 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2001 12:22 AM
>   Subject: RE: Defending the Maximals!
> 
> 
>   ::Divebomb/Rampage/Razorclaw::
>   He shakes his head, dodging the blaster fire. Then, his optics pick 
>   up a large object, that seems to be destroying bots. He laughs to 
>   himself, <easy target>... or so he thinks. He fires four particle 
>   blasts at the bot, Prowl.
> 
>   Rampage growls, and continues firing on Astral, and his party.
> 
>   Razorclaw sees the perfect opertunity. Khonkolor was looking up, 
>   and firing at Divebomb. Razorclaw puts all of his effort of the 
>   moment into his action, he fires eight concussion blasts at 
>   Khonkolor.
> 
>   On 4 Apr 2001, at 0:07, airly2000@... wrote:
>

>   > Khonkolor
>   > 
>   > 
>   > Khonkolor avoided the shot and used his blaster agaisnt Divebomb "If you do=
>   > n't like land.... I'll force you land!!!!"

>   >   OOC: i wasn't sure at the time whether you were firing an EMP=20
>   >   cannon or an EMP grenade. =3D)
>   > 
>   >   ::Divebomb::
>   >   He hears something being said below, but he ignores it. "Haha,=20
>   >   just die slag pile!" He fires four particle blasts at Khonkolor
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   On 4 Apr 2001, at 0:33, airly2000@... wrote:
>   > 
>   >   > ooc: I _SHOULD_ read character'sprofile before attack... why always I=20
>   >   > forget that?, about Emp yes is a granade with high power.. until I=20
>   >   > know,...
>   >   >=20
>   >   > Khonkolor jumped from sid to side avoiding the shots "Come one,=20
>   >   > birdie, why don't you land and fight here?" said Khonkolor "Are you=20
>   >   > afraid play with a cat???? or are you a sort of hen???"
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   >=20
>   >   > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
>   >   > > OOC: is this an EMP grenade? (Also, Divebomb had been flying=20
>   >   > > straight up for two and a half posts. He's pretty high, i'd be=20
>   >   > > surprised with Khonkolor could see him.)
>   >   > >=20
>   >   > > ::Divebomb::
>   >   > > He watches the EMP coming up, and dodges it quite easily,=20
>   >   > > blasting away with his rocket boosters. He returns fire (at=20
>   >   > > Khonkolor) with three particle rifle blasts, his eagle eyes keeping=20
>   >   > > track of the bot easily.=20=20
>   >   > >=20
>   >   > >=20
>   >   > > On 4 Apr 2001, at 0:08, airly2000@y... wrote:
>   >   > >=20
>   >   > > > Khonkolor::
>   >   > > >=20
>   >   > > > Khonkolor avoided the shots and threw a EMP against Divebomb

>   >   > > >=20

>   >   > > > > ::Divebomb::
>   >   > > > > Divebomb swerves, spining rapidly, avoiding some fire, and=20
>   >   > > > > deflecting other parts of, but some fire hits his armour, and=20
>   >   > he is=20
>   >   > > > > annoyed because of it. He turns around, he eagle eye sight=20
>   >   > > > > spotting Khonkolor. "Mwhahaha," He fires three particle blasts=20
>   >   > at=20
>   >   > > > > Khonkolor.
>   >   > > > >=20

>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > > The young loin mountain shot 25 times against  Divebomb
>   >   > > > > >   ----- Original Message -----=20
>   >   > > > > >   From: rAuq=20
>   >   > > > > >   To: nbwrpg@y...=20
>   >   > > > > >   Sent: Monday, April 02, 2001 10:51 PM
>   >   > > > > >   Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   OOC: is the Element firing four EMP blasts, one missile,=20
>   >   > and=20
>   >   > > > five=20
>   >   > > > > >   plasma blasts at each bot on the field?
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   ::Razorclaw/Divebomb/Rampage::
>   >   > > > > >   Razorclaw destroys the missiles being guided at=20
>   >   > Rippersnapper=20
>   >   > > > > >   with his lightning gun in between dodging blasts, though a=20
>   >   > > > couple=20
>   >   > > > > >   are absorbed into his armour. He follows up by sending=20
>   >   > three=20
>   >   > > > more=20
>   >   > > > > >   lightning blasts at Mantle.
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   Divebomb transforms, using his heightened agility to dodge=20
>   >   > > > straight=20
>   >   > > > > >   up many of the shots heading at him. Two of the shots smash=20
>   >   > > > into=20
>   >   > > > > >   his metallic wings, leaving charred marks, and almost=20
>   >   > knocking=20
>   >   > > > > >   him from the sky. His rocket boosters send him straight up=20
>   >   > at=20
>   >   > > > an=20
>   >   > > > > >   increasing speed, away from the near battle.
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   Rampage is so angry; consequently, he has lost "it". As one=20
>   >   > of=20
>   >   > > > the=20
>   >   > > > > >   laser blasts hits him, he dives to the ground, dodging the=20
>   >   > > > missiles=20
>   >   > > > > >   and the rest of the shots. He transforms into tiger mode as=20
>   >   > he=20
>   >   > > > hits=20
>   >   > > > > >   the ground. Immediately, he begins firing as much as he=20
>   >   > can,=20
>   >   > > > > >   pumping out continues rounds from his four leg mounted=20
>   >   > machine=20
>   >   > > > > >   guns at Astral, and the bots around him.
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   On 2 Apr 2001, at 19:44, Jen D. wrote:
>   >   > > > > >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > (ooc: I'm not good at battles, so sorry if this is=20
>   >   > > > confusing :)
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Cyndro's scanners detected weaponfire outside the=20
>   >   > Element,=20
>   >   > > > and quickly made=20
>   >   > > > > >   > a scan to find out who the attackers were. Soon he knew=20
>   >   > the=20
>   >   > > > location and=20
>   >   > > > > >   > weaponry of every Decepticon in the area.
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > "You might wanna go out there and fight them, Rubble,=20
>   >   > we're=20
>   >   > > > under attack."=20
>   >   > > > > >   > he says through a speaker to Rubble, who thanks him and=20
>   >   > runs=20
>   >   > > > out of the=20
>   >   > > > > >   > base. Cyndro reroutes more power to the shields, and then=20
>   >   > > > activates the=20
>   >   > > > > >   > defences.
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > The round plate on top of the Element flashed several=20
>   >   > times,=20
>   >   > > > and then a=20
>   >   > > > > >   > deafening screech was emmited over all comm frequencees=20
>   >   > other=20
>   >   > > > than the ones=20
>   >   > > > > >   > that the Maximals were using. After a few seconds, the=20
>   >   > > > screech shut off, and=20
>   >   > > > > >   > a jamming signal was sent out to disable any=20
>   >   > communications=20
>   >   > > > that the enemies=20
>   >   > > > > >   > might have. During the screech, most of the weapons on=20
>   >   > the=20
>   >   > > > Element fired at=20
>   >   > > > > >   > the hopefully distracted bots, sending four EMP blasts,=20
>   >   > one=20
>   >   > > > missile, and=20
>   >   > > > > >   > five plasma shots at each one, other than the ones that=20
>   >   > were=20
>   >   > > > shielded by the=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Cybertronian Fire (I think FireBlade is the only one=20
>   >   > > > shielded :).
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Mantle spun around when all the enemies arrived, and was=20
>   >   > > > immediately ready=20
>   >   > > > > >   > for battle. He flew into the air and stretched out both=20
>   >   > arms.=20
>   >   > > > A missile flew=20
>   >   > > > > >   > out of each arm, both of them mentally guided by Mantle=20
>   >   > to=20
>   >   > > > hit=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Rippersnapper. Out of the corner of his eyes, Mantle=20
>   >   > could=20
>   >   > > > see Aqua firing=20
>   >   > > > > >   > his spear gun at Flesh Ripper, the same bot that he had=20
>   >   > tried=20
>   >   > > > to get during=20
>   >   > > > > >   > the last battle. Near him, Cinder was already firing at=20
>   >   > > > Rippersnapper.=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Mantle knew that Cinder wanted to impress Prowl, but he=20
>   >   > hoped=20
>   >   > > > that she=20
>   >   > > > > >   > wouldn't do stupid things to show off.
>   >   > > > > >   >=20
>   >   > > > > >   > "Allright, guys, we'll fight like this for a while, and=20
>   >   > then=20
>   >   > > > we'll form=20
>   >   > > > > >   > Element and chase these guys out of here!" he said to his=20
>   >   > > > team over the=20
>   >   > > > > >   > commlink, watching Rubble emerge from the Element with=20
>   >   > his=20
>   >   > > > missile launcher=20
>   >   > > > > >   > and fire two missiles at Rampage. Mist flew by above him,=20
>   >   > > > firing three=20
>   >   > > > > >   > charges down at Autofire.
>   >   > > > > >   >=20

>   >   >   > that the Maximals were using. After a few seconds, the 
>   >   <BR>> > > screech shut off, and <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > a jamming signal was sent out to disable any <BR>> 
>   >   communications <BR>> > > that the enemies <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > might have. During the screech, most of the weapons on 
>   >   <BR>> the <BR>> > > Element fired at <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > the hopefully distracted bots, sending four EMP blasts, 
>   >   <BR>> one <BR>> > > missile, and <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > five plasma shots at each one, other than the ones that 
>   >   <BR>> were <BR>> > > shielded by the <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > Cybertronian Fire (I think FireBlade is the only one 
>   >   <BR>> > > shielded :).<BR>> > > > >   > 
>   >   <BR>> > > > >   > <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > Mantle spun around when all the enemies arrived, and was 
>   >   <BR>> > > immediately ready <BR>> > > > >   
>   >   > for battle. He flew into the air and stretched out both <BR>> arms. 
>   >   <BR>> > > A missile flew <BR>> > > > >   
>   >   > out of each arm, both of them mentally guided by Mantle <BR>> to 
>   >   <BR>> > > hit <BR>> > > > >   > 
>   >   Rippersnapper. Out of the corner of his eyes, Mantle <BR>> could <BR>> 
>   >   > > see Aqua firing <BR>> > > > >   > his 
>   >   spear gun at Flesh Ripper, the same bot that he had <BR>> tried <BR>> 
>   >   > > to get during <BR>> > > > >   > the last 
>   >   battle. Near him, Cinder was already firing at <BR>> > > 
>   >   Rippersnapper. <BR>> > > > >   > Mantle knew that 
>   >   Cinder wanted to impress Prowl, but he <BR>> hoped <BR>> > > that 
>   >   she <BR>> > > > >   > wouldn't do stupid things to 
>   >   show off.<BR>> > > > >   > <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > "Allright, guys, we'll fight like this for a while, and 
>   >   <BR>> then <BR>> > > we'll form <BR>> > > > 
>   >   >   > Element and chase these guys out of here!" he said to 
>   >   his <BR>> > > team over the <BR>> > > > >   
>   >   > commlink, watching Rubble emerge from the Element with <BR>> his 
>   >   <BR>> > > missile launcher <BR>> > > > >   
>   >   > and fire two missiles at Rampage. Mist flew by above him, <BR>> > 
>   >   > firing three <BR>> > > > >   > charges down 
>   >   at Autofire.<BR>> > > > >   > <BR>> > >
